reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Enhancing regulatory effectiveness for business in China

description.narrative: This project is designed to enhance the effectiveness of regulations for business in China. It will introduce UK best practice and support China's creation of a robust regulatory regime that will enhance the sustainability of its financial system. This will reduce financial risks and market misconduct thereby benefiting international including UK business' in China. The project will lay the foundations for the Rule of Law pillar of a China prosperity programme. This pillar will support China's progress towards a stronger rule of law including clearer judicial processes, dispute resolution and protection of intellectual property, ultimately leading to an improved business environment and stronger economic growth.
